meanings.definition: A sweet baked food made of dough with fruit, nuts, or other sweet ingredients
meanings.sent1: I love to bake pastries with my grandma on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street sells delicious pastries.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a pastry from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a freshly baked pastry.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked pastries filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A small, light cake or sweet food made with pastry
meanings.sent1: She bought a box of pastries for the office party.
meanings.sent2: The tea party featured an assortment of delicate pastries.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a live rabbit out of a pastry!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sprinkle of sugar on a pastry.
meanings.sent5: The pastries at the bakery were so light and fluffy.
